languages.text: "Филопимен Мальпийский — пастырь родом из владений Винтерскейлов. Он проповедовал в одну эпоху со святым Никомедасом и обличал его в неверном почитании святого Когнация. Филопимен верил, что Когнаций нес людям непостижимость вышней мудрости, и попытки ее познать лишь уводят в ересь. Поиски могилы святого Когнация он нарек кощунством, а собирание реликвий — мародерством и стяжательством. По его мнению святыни не должны копиться в одних руках, а находить пристанище на многих мирах. Реликвии есть власть, и накопление их ведет к гордыне".

"Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."
languages.original_text: "Филопимен Мальпийский — пастырь родом из владений Винтерскейлов. Он проповедовал в одну эпоху со святым Никомедасом и обличал его в неверном почитании святого Когнация. traits.locale_text: "Philipomenes of Malfi is a pastor from the Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same age as Nicomedas Cephas and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that the attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site a blasphemy , and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place, but find their place across many worlds. The relics are power, and their congregation gives way to pride".

languages.text: “马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯是位来自温特斯凯尔星区的牧师，与尼科梅迪斯·基弗在同一时期布道。他谴责基弗对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的虚假崇拜。他认为，科尼亚蒂乌斯向人们宣扬的是最高智慧的不可知性，任何试图学习最高智慧的尝试只会促成异端邪说。他声称，寻找圣科尼亚蒂乌斯墓地的行为是对神明的亵渎，是对文物的强取豪夺。在他看来，圣物不应该聚集在一个地方，而应该分散在众多世界中，寻得庇护。遗物本身就存在力量，将他们聚集在一起，不过是出于傲慢而已。”
languages.original_text: "Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."

“马尔皮的菲洛匹厄斯是位来自温特斯凯尔领地的牧师，与尼科梅迪斯·基弗在同一时期布道。他谴责基弗对圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的虚假崇拜。他认为，科尼亚蒂乌斯向人们宣扬的是最高智慧的不可知性，任何试图学习最高智慧的尝试只会促成异端邪说。他声称，寻找圣科尼亚蒂乌斯墓地的行为是对神明的亵渎，是对文物的强取豪夺。在他看来，圣物不应该聚集在一个地方，而应该分散在众多世界中，寻得庇护。遗物本身就存在力量，将他们聚集在一起，不过是出于傲慢而已。”

languages.text: «Filopimenes de Malpi es un sacerdote del dominio de Winterscale. Predicó en la misma época que Nicomedes Keefe y lo acusó de falsa veneración de san Cognatius. Creía que Cognatius predicaba la incomprensibilidad de la más alta sabiduría a la gente, y que cualquier intento de entenderla solo conduciría a la herejía. Calificaba de blasfemia la búsqueda de la sepultura de san Cognatius, y la obtención de sus reliquias, de saqueo. En su opinión, los objetos sagrados no deberían reunirse en un solo lugar, sino repartirse en distintos mundos. Las reliquias son poder, y su acumulación da paso al orgullo».
languages.original_text: "Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."

languages.text: 「マルピのフィロピメーネスとは、ウィンタースケールの領域出身の司祭です。ニコメダス・キーフと同時代に布教活動を行い、彼が聖コグナティウスへの誤った崇拝を行っていると糾弾しました。彼は、コグナティウスが民に最高の知恵の不可解さを説いており、それを学ぼうとすれば異端につながると考えていました。彼は、聖コグナティウスの埋葬地を探すことは冒涜行為であり、聖遺物を収集するなどは略奪であり、不法行為だと糾弾しました。彼の意見では、聖なものは一か所に集積されるべきではなく、さまざまな惑星に安寧の場所を見い出すべきとのことです。聖遺物は力そのものであり、その集合体が誇りへとつながります」
languages.original_text: "Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."

「マルピのフィロピメーネスとは、ウィンタースケールの領域出身の司祭です。ニコメダス・セファスと同時代に布教活動を行い、彼が聖コグナティウスへの誤った崇拝を行っていると糾弾しました。彼は、コグナティウスが民に最高の知恵の不可解さを説いており、それを学ぼうとすれば異端につながると考えていました。彼は、聖コグナティウスの埋葬地を探すことは冒涜行為であり、聖遺物を収集するなどは略奪であり、不法行為だと糾弾しました。彼の意見では、聖なものは一か所に集積されるべきではなく、さまざまな惑星に安寧の場所を見い出すべきとのことです。聖遺物は力そのものであり、その集合体が誇りへとつながります」

languages.text: « Philopimène de Malpi était un prêtre issu du territoire des Winterscale. Il prêchait à la même époque que Nicomède Keefe et dénonçait la vénération sacrilège de Saint Cognatius par Nicomède. Selon Philopimène, Cognatius professait que les plus hautes formes de sagesse restaient insondables pour le peuple, et que toute tentative de les acquérir ne pouvait mener qu'à l'hérésie. Les fouilles de la sépulture de Saint Cognatius étaient à ses yeux un blasphème, et la collecte de reliques, un pillage éhonté. Il était fermement convaincu que les objets sacrés devraient non pas être rassemblés en un seul endroit, mais plutôt confiés à différents gardiens de par l'univers. Les reliques représentent le pouvoir, et leur accumulation ne peut que nourrir l'orgueil. »
languages.original_text: "Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."

Les reliques représentent le pouvoir, et leur accumulation ne peut que nourrir l'orgueil. »

languages.text: "Philopimenes von Malpi ist ein Priester aus dem Reich der Winterzunders. Er hat zur selben Zeit wie Nicodemes Keefe gepredigt und diesen wegen falscher Verehrung des Heiligen Cognatius kritisiert. Er war überzeugt, dass Cognatius den Leutendie Unbegreiflichkeit des Wissens predigte, und dass jeder Versuch, dieses Wissen zu erlernen, nur zur Ketzerei führen könne. Er nannte die Suche nach der Grabstätte des Heiligen Cognatius Blasphemie und das Sammeln der Reliquien Plünderung und Diebstahl. In seinen Augen sollten die heiligen Gegenstände nicht an einem einzigen Ort versammelt sein, sondern Zuflucht auf vielen verschiedenen Welten finden. Die Reliquien sind Macht, und wenn man sie versammelt, führt das nur zu Stolz."
languages.original_text: "Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."

traits.locale_text: "Philopimenes von Malpi ist ein Priester aus dem Einflussbereich der Winterzunders. Er hat zur selben Zeit wie Nicodemes Keefe gepredigt und diesen wegen falscher Verehrung des Heiligen Cognatius kritisiert. Er war überzeugt, dass Cognatius den Leuten das unbegreifliche, höchste Wissens predigte, und dass jeder Versuch, dieses Wissen zu erlernen, nur zur Ketzerei führen könne. Er nannte die Suche nach der Grabstätte des Heiligen Cognatius Blasphemie und das Sammeln der Reliquien Plünderung und Diebstahl. In seinen Augen sollten die heiligen Gegenstände nicht an einem einzigen Ort versammelt sein, sondern Zuflucht auf vielen verschiedenen Welten finden. Die Reliquien sind Macht, und wenn man sie versammelt, führt das nur zu Stolz."

"Philopimenes von Malpi ist ein Priester aus dem Reich der Winterzunders. Er hat zur selben Zeit wie Nicomedas Cephas gepredigt und diesen wegen falscher Verehrung des Heiligen Cognatius kritisiert. Er war überzeugt, dass Cognatius den Leuten das unbegreifliche, höchste Wissens predigte, und dass jeder Versuch, dieses Wissen zu erlernen, nur zur Ketzerei führen konnte. Er nannte die Suche nach der Grabstätte des Heiligen Cognatius Blasphemie und das Sammeln der Reliquien Plünderung und Diebstahl. In seinen Augen sollten die heiligen Gegenstände nicht an einem einzigen Ort versammelt sein, sondern Zuflucht auf vielen verschiedenen Welten finden. Die Reliquien sind Macht, und wenn man sie versammelt, so führt das nur zu Stolz."

languages.text: "Malpili Philopimenes, Winterscale Diyarı'nda yaşayan bir rahiptir. Nicomedes Keefe ile aynı zamanlarda vaaz vermiştir ve Aziz Cognatius'un kutsallığın düzmece olduğu iddiasıyla onun aleyhine konuşmuştur. Cognatius'un halka en yüce bilgeliğin anlaşılmaz olduğuna ve bu bilgeliği öğrenmeye yönelik tüm girişimlerin yalnızca kâfirlikle sonuçlanacağına dair vaaz verdiğini düşünmektedir. Aziz Cognatius'un kabristanının aranmasını dine aykırılık, yadigârların toplanmasını ise yağmacılık ve dilencilik olarak görmüştür. Onun gözünde kutsal nesneler, tek bir yerde toplanmak yerine pek çok dünyada saklanmalıdır. Yadigârlar güç demektir ve bir araya gelmeleri kibre yol açar."
languages.original_text: "Philopimenes of Malpi is a priest from Winterscale's Realm. He preached in the same times as Nicomedes Keefe and denounced him for the false veneration of Saint Cognatius. He believed that Cognatius preached the incomprehensibility of the highest wisdom to the people, and that any attempts to learn it would only lead to heresy. He called the search for Saint Cognatius's burial site blasphemy and the collection of relics looting and soliciting. In his opinion, the sacred objects should not be congregated in one place but should find haven across the many worlds. The relics are power, and their aggregation gives way to pride."
